poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Wells is deep. He does cheap Fiction wherein warts and wens Denote the wems and sins of Those he welds to Weds and pledges In the wends and twists of Plotted webs strung tight. Ah but the whelms and runnels of prosody Have to be cut for the stream and the slope. When's a good time? - I'nt it just. And where's a good place.
